```{r}
table4a
```

```{r}
tidy4a <- table4a |>
  pivot_longer(
  cols = -country,
    names_to = "Year",
    values_to = "cases"
  )
```

```{r}
tidy4a
```

```{r}
ag_table4b <- table4b |>
  rename(
    y1999 = `1999`,
    y2000 = `2000`
  )
```

```{r}
tidy4b <- ag_table4b |>
  pivot_longer(
  cols = -country,
    names_to = "year",
    values_to = "pop",
    names_prefix = "y"
  )
```

```{r}
tidy4b
```

```{r}
tidy4 <- left_join(tidy4a, tidy4b, join_by(country, Year == year)) |>
  rename(year = Year)

```

tidy4
